c74object.name: abc.hoa.scope~
c74object.description: abc.hoa.scope~ is an High Order Ambisonics (HOA) scope process. This objects objects enable the visualization of the ambisonic field in a scope~ Max graphical object The abc.scope abstraction within a bpatcher enables to graphically render the ambisonic field using Jitter OpenGL.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.description: sets the refresh time in ms for the visualization [init=10:min=1:max=2000:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the refresh time in ms

method.name: refresh
method.description: sets the refresh time in ms for the visualization [init=10:min=1:max=2000:step=1].
method.digest: sets the refresh time in ms
